channel.title: DevOps on NS News and Views
channel.description: Recent content in DevOps on NS News and Views

item.title: Locked out user email notification
item.description: It recently occurred to me, that whilst my current full-time position is an IT Systems Manager, the majority of my blog posts thus far, have been more web centric – which is great, as I love the web and web technologies!

item.title: A blend of style and performance
item.description: Recently, I had the privilege of designing and building the Wylye Valley Art Trail website. The 2015 trail consists of 75 venues, and in-excess of 300 artists – I’m sure you’ll agree, that’s a reasonable size!
